other_tests.findings: Mixed bacterial flora-culture screened for B. fragilis, C. perfringens, and C. septicum. None isolated.

New small bilateral effusions. Moderate cardiomegaly is unchanged. 3.9 x 2.6 cm hypodensity in posterior right dome of the liver likely represents cyst. Multiple subcentimeter hypodensities in both kidneys likely represent cysts. No abdominal free fluid or free air.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Unchanged lymphadenopathy measuring up to 1.3 cm; cecal wall thickening to 1 cm is unchanged.
